categories: Category:Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi

nodes.text: Dawn of the Jedi: Force War 2

Dawn of the Jedi: Force War 2 is the twelfth issue in the Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi comic book series and the second in the Force War arc. It is set in 25,792 BBY during the earliest days of the Jedi Order, in a time before the polarization of the light and dark sides of the Force. This issue was released on December 18, 2013.
The Je'daii go on the offensive against the invading Rakatan Empire!

Xesh uses his Force Hound training to locate the Rakatan command center, which sparks an ambitious plan: infiltrate the enemy stronghold and kill the supreme commander. But Xesh has not accounted for a traitor in his own ranks!
